byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by William K. Rashbaum and Michael Schwirtz in New York, and Susanne Craig and Lisa W. Foderaro in Malone, N.Y. Research was contributed by Susan C. Beachy.

abstract: Law enforcement authorities widen search area in northern New York State in efforts to capture escaped inmate David Sweat, who remains at large three weeks after prison break from Clinton Correctional Facility in Dannemora; move follows fatal shooting of fellow escapee Richard W Matt by federal officer.
lead_paragraph: The authorities on Saturday expanded to 22 square miles the search area for David Sweat, who escaped from the Clinton Correctional Facility.

headline.main: Size of Manhunt Area for Second Prison Escapee Is Significantly Expanded
headline.print_headline: Size of Manhunt Area for 2nd Prison Escapee Significantly Expanded
